item.title: 沙特阿拉伯磨坊公司首次公开募股目标筹资高达 2.71 亿美元
item.description: Arabian Mills for Food Products Co.表示，该公司计划在当地证券交易所首次公开发行股票，向投资者出售 30% 的股份，从而筹集高达 2.71 亿美元的资金。【原文：Arabian Mills for Food Products Co. said it plans to raise as much as $271 million by selling a 30% stake to investors in an initial public offering on the local stock exchange.】

item.title: 菲律宾特工在网络犯罪突袭中拘留 160 多人
item.description: 菲律宾马尼拉（美联社）— 菲律宾官员周日表示，菲律宾当局突袭了中部某省的一个涉嫌非法在线游戏和网络诈骗的综合体，拘押了 160 多人— 其中大部分是中国人和印尼人— 他们正在从事基于互联网的犯罪活动。【原文：MANILA, Philippines (AP) — Philippine authorities raided a suspected illegal online gaming and cyberscam complex in a central province and took into custody more than 160 people — mostly Chinese and Indonesians — who were committing internet-based crimes, officials said Sunday.】

item.title: 土耳其企业面临 "一轮又一轮 "的问题，因为 50%的税率会带来影响
item.description: 在顽固的高通胀、成本上升、融资渠道减少和需求疲软等多重因素的打击下，土耳其企业正在无数挑战的重压下苦苦挣扎。【原文：Turkish companies are struggling under the weight of myriad challenges, hit by a combination of stubbornly high inflation, rising costs, dwindling access to finance and weak demand.】

item.title: 澳门博彩业收入上升，夏季需求缓解了打压担忧
item.description: 由于中国暑假期间娱乐需求上升，澳门 8 月份博彩收入增长 14.8%，超出预期，为这个全球最大的赌场中心提供了增长动力。【原文：Macau’s gaming revenue rose 14.8% in August, exceeding forecasts as demand for entertainment rose during China’s summer vacation, providing growth momentum for the world’s largest casino hub.】

item.title: 新加坡华侨银行部分用户的银行网站和移动应用程序瘫痪
item.description: 新加坡贷款机构华侨银行（Oversea-Chinese Banking Corp.【原文：Singapore lender Oversea-Chinese Banking Corp.’s website and mobile app couldn’t be accessed by some users on Sunday.】

item.title: 捷克提议在 2025 选举年再次削减预算赤字
item.description: 捷克财政保守派政府提交了一份预算草案，旨在进一步减少 2025 年选举年的赤字。【原文：The Czech fiscally conservative government presented a draft budget that seeks to further reduce the deficit in the election year 2025.】

item.title: 巴西特贝特称政府计划在 2025 年进行开支审查
item.description: 巴西规划部长西蒙娜-特贝特（Simone Tebet）表示，巴西政府预计将在明年下半年进行一次 "真正的支出审查"，重点是实现 2026 年的财政目标。【原文：Brazil’s government expects to make a “true spending review” in the second half of next year with a focus on achieving its 2026 fiscal target, according to Planning Minister Simone Tebet.】

item.title: 工党税收计划打击商界领袖信心
item.description: 由于担心工党新政府可能增税，8 月份公司老板对英国经济的乐观情绪急剧下降。【原文：Optimism in the UK economy among company bosses plummeted in August because of worries about likely tax increases from the new Labour government.】

item.title: 最高法院做出裁决后，马斯克的 X 汽车在巴西停产
item.description: 亿万富翁埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）拒绝为其社交网络指定拉丁美洲最大国家的法定代表人，巴西最高法院下令，埃隆-马斯克的 X 公司周六开始在巴西停业。【原文：Elon Musk’s X started to go dark on Saturday in Brazil at the order of the nation’s top court after the billionaire refused to name a legal representative for the social network in Latin America’s largest nation.】

item.title: 美国就业数据将帮助美联储衡量经济放缓的程度
item.description: 即将公布的美国劳动力市场数据，包括月度薪资报告，将使美联储政策制定者深入了解在两周多一点的时间内几乎确定降息之后进一步降息的必要性。【原文：Upcoming readouts on the US labor market, including the monthly payrolls report, will give Federal Reserve policymakers insight into the need for further interest-rate reductions after an all-but-certain cut in a little more than two weeks.】

item.title: 业主面临 1.5 万亿美元的商业地产到期墙
item.description: 据仲量联行公司（Jones Lang LaSalle Inc.【原文：Landlords for offices, apartment complexes and other commercial real estate have $1.5 trillion of debt due by the end of next year, and about a quarter of that borrowing could be hard to refinance, according to Jones Lang LaSalle Inc.】

item.title: 石油产量激增，圭亚那将增长预期上调至 43
item.description: 伊尔法安-阿里总统将圭亚那的年增长率从之前的 34.8%提高到 42.8%，因为他预计公共和私营部门将 "加大 "投资。【原文：President Irfaan Ali raised estimates for Guyana’s yearly growth to 42.8% from a prior 34.8%, as he projects “ramped up” investments from the public and private sectors.】

item.title: 南非财政部长称稳定的政治局势为兰特提供支撑
item.description: 南非财政部长伊诺克-戈东瓦纳（Enoch Godongwana）表示，南非在五月大选后迅速组建了新的联合政府，这增强了投资者的信心，并推动了该国货币和股市的反弹。【原文：The swift formation of a new coalition government in South Africa after May elections has bolstered investor confidence and fueled a rally in the nation’s currency and the stock market, Finance Minister Enoch Godongwana said.】

item.title: 美国钢铁业预计 2025 年经济将恢复对钢铁的需求
item.description: 美国钢铁业高管表示，他们对明年工业材料需求反弹持乐观态度，2024 年将从需求低迷和价格低迷的困境中恢复过来。【原文：American steel executives say they’re optimistic that demand for the industrial material will rebound next year, recovering from the lackluster demand and low prices that have hobbled the industry in 2024.】

item.title: 印度预测下月季风降雨量充足，将促进农作物生长
item.description: 据预测，在 6 月至 9 月季风季节的最后一个月，印度将迎来高于正常水平的降雨，这将为大米和大豆等农作物的丰收前景带来光明。【原文：India is forecast to receive above-normal rains in the last month of the June-September monsoon season, brightening prospects for a bumper harvest for crops such as rice and soybeans.】

item.title: 丹麦称必须允许乌克兰在俄罗斯境内使用 F-16 战斗机
item.description: 丹麦首相梅特-弗雷德里克森（Mette Frederiksen）说，盟国必须向乌克兰提供击退俄罗斯入侵所需的物资，而不是限制捐赠武器的使用。【原文：Allies must give Ukraine what it needs to repel Russia’s invasion and not restrict the use of donated arms, Danish Prime Minister Mette Frederiksen said.】

item.title: 前董事会主席称蒂森克虏伯钢铁公司将从克里廷斯基公司获利
item.description: 蒂森克虏伯股份公司（Thyssenkrupp AG）即将离任的监事会主席西格玛-加布里尔（Sigmar Gabriel）向《明镜周刊》表示，捷克亿万富翁丹尼尔-克雷廷斯基（Daniel Kretinsky）的深入参与将使该公司陷入困境的钢铁部门获益。【原文：Thyssenkrupp AG’s ailing steel division would profit from a deeper involvement of Czech billionaire Daniel Kretinsky, the unit’s departing supervisory board head Sigmar Gabriel said to Der Spiegel.】

item.title: 从汇丰银行离职后，马托斯成为欧洲最炙手可热的银行家之一
item.description: 上个月，汇丰控股有限公司（HSBC Holdings Plc）的高管们排队公开欢迎乔治-埃尔德里（Georges Elhedery）就任该行下一任首席执行官，但在社交媒体的祝酒辞中，有一个著名的声音却明显缺席：努诺-马托斯（Nuno Matos）。【原文：As HSBC Holdings Plc’s top executives queued up last month to publicly welcome the installation of Georges Elhedery as the bank’s next chief executive officer, one prominent voice was notably absent from the social media toasts: Nuno Matos.】

item.title: 美元短缺后尼日利亚奈拉在平行市场下跌
item.description: 在停止向当地兑换所供应外币导致争抢美元之后，尼日利亚奈拉在平行市场上兑美元汇率下跌，与官方汇率的差距扩大。【原文：Nigeria’s naira fell against the dollar on the parallel market, widening the gap with the official rate, after a halt in foreign currency supply to local bureaux de change led to a scramble for the greenback.】

item.title: 黄金的 "尾风 "足以战胜 "九月魔咒 "吗？
item.description: 从暑假归来的黄金投资者将拭目以待，看看贵金属是能维持破纪录的涨势，还是会屈服于九月的诅咒。【原文：Gold investors returning from their summer holidays will be eager to see whether the precious metal can sustain its record-breaking rally, or if it will succumb to the curse of September.】

item.title: 亚马逊将聘请 Covariant 创始人拓展仓库自动化业务
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）正在聘用机器人软件制造商 Covariant 公司的创始人，此举被称为 "收购"（acquihire），旨在帮助这家电子商务龙头企业提高仓库自动化水平。【原文：Amazon.com Inc. is hiring the founders of robot-software maker Covariant, in a move known as an “acquihire” that is aimed at helping the e-commerce leader boost its warehouse automation.】

item.title: 中国陷入困境的太阳能产业或将迎来转折点
item.description: 中国太阳能制造商刚刚经历了一个血雨腥风的财报季，但有初步迹象表明，困扰该行业的大规模供应过剩问题可能开始缓解。【原文：China’s solar manufacturers have just been through a bloodbath of an earnings season, but there are tentative signs the massive glut that’s plaguing the industry could be starting to ease.】

item.title: 寻找美联储支点赢家引发印尼、马来西亚热潮
item.description: 全球投资者正加大对印尼和马来西亚的投资，因为他们押注，随着美联储看来将开始放松货币政策，这两个市场将比其发展中国家的同行更受益。【原文：Global investors are boosting exposure to Indonesia and Malaysia on bets the two markets will benefit more than their developing-nation peers as the Federal Reserve looks set to embark on monetary easing.】

item.title: 巴菲特再次抛售美国银行股票，不久后他可能会秘密交易
item.description: 沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）的伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway Inc.也就是说，如果他继续削减投资的话。【原文：Warren Buffett’s Berkshire Hathaway Inc. won’t have to swiftly disclose its rapid-fire sales of Bank of America Corp. stock too much longer. That is, if he keeps whittling the investment.】

item.title: 据环球网报道，埃尔-查波之子进入美国证人保护计划
item.description: 据《环球报》周五援引缉毒局消息来源报道，被监禁的大毒枭华金-"埃尔-查波"-古斯曼（Joaquín "El Chapo" Guzman）的儿子奥维迪奥-古斯曼（Ovidio Guzmán）已进入美国证人保护计划。【原文：Ovidio Guzmán, a son of imprisoned drug lord Joaquín “El Chapo” Guzman, has entered the witness protection program in the US, daily El Universal reported on Friday citing a DEA source.】

item.title: 华尔街千载难逢的反弹引发软着陆风险
item.description: 开局不利。但是，自大流行病以来最严重的波动性暴跌发生四周后，8 月份将成为华尔街对其预测未来能力的又一次信心大展示。【原文：It began badly. But four weeks on from the worst volatility blowup since the pandemic, August will go down as another grand gesture of confidence by Wall Street in its ability to suss out the future.】

item.title: 富国银行在激烈的财报电话会议后下调前程无忧目标价
item.description: 富国银行（Wells Fargo & Co.）下调了价值 80 亿美元的上市私人信贷基金 Prospect Capital Corp. 的目标价，原因是现有股东面临进一步稀释的风险。【原文：Wells Fargo & Co. cut its price target on Prospect Capital Corp., an $8 billion publicly traded private credit fund, over the risk of further dilution for existing shareholders.】

item.title: 国际可可组织称可可赤字将比先前估计的更严重
item.description: 由于恶劣天气和疾病对生产造成的持续挑战，本季可可短缺问题将进一步加剧。【原文：Cocoa’s shortage is set to deepen further this season amid persistent production challenges from poor weather and disease.】

item.title: Invesco 通过 "巨型 "QQQ 基金加强科技股集中度
item.description: Invesco Ltd. 正准备推出一款交易所交易基金，让投资者能够超集中地投资于最大的科技股。【原文：Invesco Ltd. is gearing up to launch an exchange-traded fund that would allow investors to get ultra-concentrated exposure to the largest technology stocks.】

item.title: 美联储降息在即，投机交易员转而做空美元
item.description: 由于美联储有望在 9 月份启动宽松周期，投机交易商自 2 月份以来首次转而看跌美元。【原文：Speculative traders turned bearish on the dollar for the first time since February as the Federal Reserve looks set to kick off its easing cycle in September.】
